title: As Much as I Do!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Waaah, is this your pet, Alan, Rina-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. She’s trying to say hi to you, Hanayo-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wawaa! Nice to meet you. I’m Hanayo! Rina-chan always takes good care of me and.... Eh, waaah!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>She seems to like you, Hanayo-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That tickles~. Is it okay for her to like me this much even though we just met?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Alan loves her friend as much as I do. So I think that’s why she loves you, Hanayo-chan.... Rina-chan’s board「Embarrassed」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then, I’m going to love Alan as much as I love you, Rina-chan! Good girl, Alan-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>....Hanayo-chan. I kind of want you to pet me too, not just Alan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Fufu, you’re a good girl too, Rina-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It feels nice. Rina-chan’s board「Hwaaah」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
